list_definition.definition: (what is going to happen in) the time to come

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was afraid of what the future might bring

list_definition.mean_english: thuộc hoặc xảy ra trong tương lai
list_definition.definition: (of a tense of a verb) indicating an action which will take place at a later time.

list_ex_of_english: The spatial considerations are easier to conceptualize because they are related to the basis between the delivery market and the futures market.
Trading futures and derivatives, it could have been a jungle of aggressive queue jumpers, seeking to trample their fellow traders under foot.
Turning to the life scenarios, crossovers into the past tended to occur wherever the narrators had difficulty envisaging or talking about their futures.
The life trajectory therefore appears as a linear movement that connects the past with possible futures.
If daily data is available, maturity is the number of calendar days remaining until delivery of the futures contract takes place.
We initially hoped to make the indexes the basis for futures contracts, but that still hasn't happened.
The futures price, the margin (strike price), and the riskfree interest rate are observable.
The estimated differentials between arbitrage prices and the futures price demonstrate the model's capacity to capture the characteristics of the markets.
